attributes.additional_details:
As a mother of two young children this is my biggest fear & more needs to be done about the issue. 1 in 6 boys and 1 in 4 girls under the age of 18 have been abused. We need harsher laws for offenders. In my opinion this is their sexual preference and i do not believe pedophiles can reform. 
We need a track & trace system in place for offenders living in society & their passports revoked , whilst not letting foreign offenders enter the country.
attributes.background: Give pedophiles & child abusers longer & harsher sentences. We live in a country where drug dealers get harsher punishment than people who abuse children. The law needs to be updated & changed including taking , distributing & watching child pornography.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase the sentence for child sexual abuse to 25 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575469

Mandatory life sentence for child sexual abuse
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562527

Track & trace all sex offenders with electronic tagging
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553059
